gameDetails.name: The Others: 7 Sins â€“ Delta Team Expansion
gameDetails.description:
The Delta Team expansion consists of 5 heroes, including a Leader, a Bruiser, a Sniper, and two Fixers.

Delta Team brings another 12 Upgrade cards to add into your inventory deck, giving your heroes new options to face the Others. There are 6 different cards, with 2 copies each, featuring equipment such as Wengsi Wong's amazing Laz Blades which crave for the bigger baddies, IR Goggles that are perfect to make sure your Ranged attacks hit their target, and some disposable Liquid Courage that can heal all your wounds.

This expansion also gives players 3 extra Hero Dice.

The Delta Team expansion includes 5 brand new tiles set in the Old Town part of Haven, adding even more variety to the map setups you can use in your games. The box will come with a leaflet featuring maps for all 7 core box stories using these new tiles.
